article: There once lived a great fighter. Though quite old, he still was able to defeat any _ . His reputation was spread far and wide throughout the land and many students _ to study under him. One day a young fighter arrived at the village. He was _ to be the first man to _ the great master. Along with his strength, he had an _ ability to find and take advantage of any _ in a competitor. He would wait for his competitor to make he first _ , thus showing a weakness, and then would _ with extreme force and lightning speed. No one had ever _ longer than him in a match beyond the first move. Much against the _ of his concerned students, the old master gladly accepted the young man's challenge. As the two prepared for the _ , the young man began to throw insults _ the old master. He threw dirt and spit in his face. For hours he verbally _ him with every insult known to mankind. But the old master _ stood there without moving and with a calm attitude. Finally, the young man got _ himself. Knowing he was defeated, he left feeling _  Somewhat disappointed that he did not fight the _ youth, the students gathered around the old master and questioned him. "How could you stand for such insults? How did you _ him away?" "If someone comes to give you a _ and you do not accept it," the teacher replied, "to whom does the gift belong?"
